message.body: So we have a dilemma. Jacob. Cannot. Act.
In the movie?
In the movie. It's like someone bashed his skull in with a brick and put him in a coma for 6 months!!!!!!!
Haha why? Does he just seem stupid?
After every take he immediately pulls out his cell phone. He's so distracted, it's God awful.
Haha damn I thought I was bad
Pls, bruh. I'm just concerned about casting him in the next film. If we choose to make it...
well maybe we can get him to get his "act" together.
For the next film that is
Ha ha. I wanted to cast him as a James dean rebel without a cause character... Chances you'd be willing to work with him on that?
Yes I think I could do that. If you trust me with it haha
aw
You're welcome
I'll update you when we go into the third draft. You good with being the protagonist again?
Yes probably haha. When would that be ?
In a week... Also how's things with that high school girl?
Well she's my girlfriend now haha so you could say things are going well
Aw yis. Chances she can act?
Haha no offense to her but not good chances
Well fragglehorn. We'll figure something out then.
